# Nelexa\GPlay\Model\GoogleImage::__construct
`Nelexa\GPlay\Model\GoogleImage::__construct` â€” Creates a GoogleImage object from the URL of the googleusercontent.com.

## Description

## Parameters
* **$url** (string)

* **$keepParams** (bool)
